name: Appetizer Pizzas
author: HISTORYGIRL04
summary: This is a very versatile appetizer pizza recipe. A coworker of mine brought a variation of this for a potluck and I made my own from it. Any veggies can be used but I like to make an Italian version. You can mix the garlic in with the cream cheese as well, or sprinkle it on top.
ingredients: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated quartered artichoke hearts, chopped
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Press pizza dough evenly into the bottom of the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until crust is firm on top, 10 to 12 minutes
Remove crust from the oven and let cool thoroughly, 15 to 30 minutes
Spread cream cheese evenly over cooled crust
Top with tomatoes, artichokes, olives, basil, and garlic
Cut into 12 squares; chill until served
